tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mom in law, Mrs Sabita Bose, Aged 72 Years, lives in kolkata and had severe pain in the low back both knees and both ankles. Also there was constant burning sensation. We met and consulted Dr Prakash BL in Vanditha Clinic on 15Jan2021 . He patiently heard the patient story, then diagnosed her to be OSTEOARTHRITIS GRADE 4. This was confirmed by the XRAYS and Bone Mineral Density Scan. I must compliment Dr Prakash's accurate diagnosis and disease prognosis too, the explanation was Lucid and very effective in our decision making. He started medication and advised TOTAL KNEE REPLACEMENT. The surgery was performed on 29Jan2021 in PROMED Hospital, Banashankari Stage II.

Doctor Prakash BL has scientifically & systematically explained the post surgery recovery procedure to the patient. The patient's co-operation is total.  He saw the patient two times every day, kept the patient cheerful and in good humour. He is accessible always and us just a call away, we found he responds immediately. 

Further his Communication is very good & effective. The pain management was awesome and very effective and so was the physiotherapy. Because she is Bengali, his recommended Physiotherapist - Dr Anirban Kundu also  was a WoW.  

Doctor never insisted or restricted with regard to food intake, but allowed to understand & evaluate on a day to day basis, which is helpful. Our next review with Dr Prakash BL is on 19Feb2021(Discharged on 04Feb2021).

Dr Prakash BL recommended, PROMED HOSPITAL. We were there from 28Jan2021 till 04Feb2021 in room#201.  I have no hesitation in recommending the same to everyone. Awesome experience, super services, great nurses and support staff, excellent doctors.and a healthy canteen serving nice food to the patients as well as the attendants. My compliments to my front office contact Mr Praveen too. Great job done by each one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The experience could have been better. The doctor didn‚Äôt explain about the problem in depth. We had to dig in to get more details.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: As someone who loves boxing, sometimes I overdo it & damage my hands.I had a swollen nerve-Digital nerve neuroma.The doctor patiently listened to all my previous treatment, what meds I was on, etc.This gentleman(doc) gave the right meds & injection for the same. In fact I asked if my condition could be corrected with surgery, but the doc told me it'll be fine with frequent injections & meds.No offence to the doc federation, but some doctors I've visited have recommended a lot of scans even before hearing me out completely.Firstly, he knows his job, his treatment will help you.Secondly, there is a lot of mental tension with people who are into sports. You hurt or damage the tiniest nerve/tendon/ligament/cartilage of your body, you kind of get depressed that you'll never bounce back. The way doc explains the trauma and how it'll be fixed over time... boosts your morale.Lastly, the reception staff also were involved and helpful, unlike many who keep scrolling their phones.Finding the right doc for your condition will definitely benefit you.****** ******* *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very good ...doctor explained the problem very well and he was very friendly.he was very positive in his attitude

First it took two hours for consulting with veg few patients, one person only doing billing, xray and giving medicines. Then when we the doctor suggested for plaster, when asked for fees, he mentioned two strips of 1000 each. Later when you come to billing he charges a whooping 6300. **** *** ************* ** **** ** ** ************ ***** He could have mentioned at the start itself when enquires. Found it very unprofessional behaviour.
reply_text:
First of all appointment was at 11.30 am and entire treatment was completed before 12.30 pm. The first lie is exposed.
Later patient enquired only the cost of the plaster material, which was 1000 rupees each , 700 Rs discount given on plaster cast with out being asked by him. Second lie is exposed.Its fortunate on his part to get to see a senior Orthopaedic surgeon on Sunday.
 He thought professional fee comes free, that's the mentality of the patient. Rest of the cost included medicine, X Ray, cotton roll etc.
Further Cast shoe (Rs 350) was provided free to patient. 
He is utterly lost in appreciating the efforts & concern shown by the doctor & he is no  way qualified to speak about the Professionalism.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Very conservative doctor and highly experienced
We are consulting him for the past 9 years since he is very good

He charged for second consultation just because I got the tests done from outside. I was told during first that I wouldn't be charged because I wasn't given any prescription and only a list of tests was to be done.
When I went for second consultation with test report,  was given various excuses that you got test done from outside so, we'll charge you or that you came after 4 days, had you come within 3 days we wouldn't have charged.
The test costs here were sky high. I was asked for 7000 ***** * *** *** **** ***** **** ** **** **** **** *********

I had to wait for more than 40 minutes past my appointment time. Staff was not responsive. 
Doctor himself did not try to understand all my problems ( I had multiple issues shoulder back knees). He hardly inspected me and asked for an xray. Upon telling that I got an xray done some time back, he asked to get an MRI without bothering to check the X-ray. ** ****** ** **** ****** ** ***** ** *** there was noone waiting after me in the clinic.

reply_text: THE ABOVE SAID FEMALE PATIENT AGED 52 years, was given detailed hearing, properly assessed clinically and relevant X Ray done. Patient and her son were explained the medical condition in detailed and appropriate treatment advised. More than sufficient time was taken to complete the process.
